event.name: Climate Change and Design in Boston
event.shortDescription: How can the next generation of problem-solvers use design-thinking and community-based partnerships to tackle climate change?

description.html:
How can the next generation of problem-solvers use design-thinking and community-based partnerships to tackle climate change?

Join the showcase of student work from the Climate Change faculty cohort run by Boston Civic Media (BCM) and hear from local leaders.

More information about the the Fall faculty cohort and climate change courses can be found here.
